org.openimaj.image.typography

Interface Font<F extends Font<F>>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - the actual type of implementing class
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralFont, HersheyFont, MathMLFont

    public interface Font<F extends Font<F>>
    Class representing a Font that can be rendered with a FontRenderer with an associated FontStyle.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> FontStyle<T> createStyle(ImageRenderer<T,?> renderer)
      Create an instance of a FontStyle with the default parameters for the given image.
      String getName()
      Get the name of this font
      <T,Q extends FontStyle<T>> 
      FontRenderer<T,Q>      		 getRenderer(ImageRenderer<T,?> renderer)
      Get a font renderer suitable for rendering this font to the given image renderer.

    • Method Detail

      • getRenderer

        <T,Q extends FontStyle<T>> FontRenderer<T,Q> getRenderer(ImageRenderer<T,?> renderer)
        Get a font renderer suitable for rendering this font to the given image renderer.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of pixel.
        Q - type of FontStyle.
        Parameters:
        renderer - the target image renderer.
        Returns:
        the FontRenderer
